meanings.definition: The quality or state of being beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The beautifulness of the sunset took my breath away.
meanings.sent3: The garden was overflowing with colorful beautifulness.
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, I saw the true beautifulness of nature.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of beautifulness perfectly.

meanings.definition: The combination of qualities that pleases the aesthetic senses.
meanings.sent1: The beautifulness of the melody brought tears to my eyes.
meanings.sent2: She admired the beautifulness of the intricate artwork.
meanings.sent3: The cake was a masterpiece of delicious beautifulness.
meanings.sent4: The dancer moved with grace and beautifulness.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a symphony of fragrant beautifulness.
